author: adityapatwardhan
body:
Add tests for Trace-Command, especially for Trace-Command -Expression

Related code coverage report:

https://codecov.io/gh/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/9e41c647a9407e05d86f4971a6bd25719a7130d0/src/Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.Utility/commands/utility/trace

title: Add tests for Trace-Command
